history.proof: intros d t. hauto use: dta_kill_empty_states_semantics, kill_empty_states_lazy_eg_kill_empty_states.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : preDTA a : ad t : term H : reconnaissance p a t Unable to unify "reconnaissance p a t" with "reconnait (DTA_kill_empty_states (DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty_lazy (dta p a)) (dta p a))) t".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment p : preDTA a : ad t : term H : match DTA_kill (dta_states_non_empty_lazy (dta p a)) (dta p a) with | dta p a => reconnaissance p a t end Unable to unify "(reconnait ?M5606 ?M5607 -> reconnait (DTA_kill_empty_states ?M5606) ?M5607) /\\ (reconnait (DTA_kill_empty_states ?M5606) ?M5607 -> reconnait ?M5606 ?M5607)" with "reconnaissance p a t".

In environment p : preDTA a : ad s : state Heqo : MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a = Some s H0 : forall (d : DTA) (t : term), reconnait (DTA_kill_empty_states d) t -> reconnait d t H1 : forall (d : DTA) (t : term), reconnait d t -> reconnait (DTA_kill_empty_states d) t ladj : state H2 : MapGet state (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) a = Some ladj c : ad tl : term_list l : prec_list H : MapGet prec_list ladj c = Some l H4 : liste_reconnait (preDTA_kill (dta_non_empty_states_lazy p) p) l tl Unable to unify "MapGet prec_list ladj c = Some l" with "reconnaissance p a (app c tl)".

original: intros d t. unfold reconnait. unfold DTA_kill_empty_states_lazy. destruct d as [p a]. split. - intros H. apply dta_kill_empty_states_semantics. apply H. - intros H. apply dta_kill_empty_states_semantics. apply H.
